articles.title: New-look Dogs embrace buzz after bumper off-season - AFL
articles.description: New faces including Adam Treloar and No.1 pick Jamarra Ugle-Hagan have added excitement, says Caleb Daniel
articles.content:
THE WESTERN Bulldogs are the talk of the AFL after a bumper off-season and defender Caleb Daniel says they are embracing the excitement, rather than feeling pressure to perform.
